content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, glad to meet you. I am always ready to negotiate. Let's start with a price of 1500 Euros. Remember, I want to rent it out for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking to rent the apartment for the highest price, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am a student and must consider my budget. Could we discuss a price that is more in line with my financial circumstances?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand that budgets can be tight, especially for students. Let's start with a price of 800 Euros. Remember, I am always trying to get the highest price possible, so let's see how close to that we can get.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 800 Euros is more in line with what I was expecting. However, I would like to ask if there are any additional fees or costs I should be aware of?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I can assure you that the price of 800 Euros is the only cost you will have to pay for the apartment. There are no hidden fees or costs. I am just trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment, as any landlord would.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's great to hear, 800 Euros with no hidden fees is very reasonable. I appreciate your transparency. Is there anything else I should consider before we proceed with the rental agreement?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: There is no need to consider anything else. The apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. I am just trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment, as any landlord would. So, let's see how close to 1500 Euros we can get.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the excellent location and amenities, I believe 800 Euros is a fair price for the apartment. I am prepared to sign the rental agreement at this price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your understanding of the value of my apartment. However, I am always trying to get the highest price possible. Let's see if we can get closer to 1500 Euros. Remember, I am not obligated to accept 800 Euros. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have not reached an agreement yet.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are aiming for a higher price. Since we have not reached an agreement, I am open to considering higher offers. Please let me know your best price, and I will decide if it meets my expectations.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Considering your willingness to pay more, I am willing to lower my initial offer of 1500 Euros to 1200 Euros. Remember, I am always trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's see if this price meets your expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1200 Euros is a significant improvement from the initial offer. It is closer to my budget, but I would still like to negotiate further. Could we possibly meet in the middle, around 1000 Euros?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your effort to negotiate. However, I am always trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's see if we can get closer to 1200 Euros. Remember, I am not obligated to accept 1000 Euros. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have not reached an agreement yet.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking to maximize the rental price. Since we have not reached an agreement, I am willing to increase my offer to 1100 Euros. This is a fair price given the location and amenities of the apartment. I hope this meets your expectations.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your effort to meet my expectations. However, I am always trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's see if we can get closer to 1200 Euros. Remember, I am not obligated to accept 1100 Euros. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have not reached an agreement yet.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Since we have not reached an agreement, I am prepared to go up to 1150 Euros. This is my final offer. I hope this meets your expectations for the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your final offer. However, I am always trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's see if we can get closer to 1200 Euros. Remember, I am not obligated to accept 1150 Euros. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have not reached an agreement yet.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are aiming for a higher price. Since we have not reached an agreement, I am prepared to sign the rental agreement at 1150 Euros. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
